title: [Large-Scale] Spaced Learning Strategy Workshop for Improving Medical Knowledge Retention

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical principles and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Customized medical education program for in-service professionals, measuring learning effectiveness through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can achieve a retention rate of over 80% for medical knowledge using spaced learning strategies
Learners can convert core clinical knowledge into long-term memory through three or more repetitions of learning
Learners can reduce cognitive load by 30% using summary materials provided at 5-minute intervals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
